clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Lobeglitazone was approved by the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety South Korea in 2013 and is being monitored by postmarketing surveillance until 2019 Lobeglitazone is not approved for use by either the Food and Drug Administration USA Health Canada or by the European Medicines Agency for use in the management of diabetes

contraindications.disease: Lobeglitazone showed a similar adverse effect profile to pioglitazone another thiazolidinedione medication from the same class The most concerning side effects found were edema and weight gain with no severe adverse effects Notably there were no observable changes to patients with heart failure which is a concern associated with other medications of the same class A19751
